column1: # `also known as` is a separator for aliases
# everything in brackets are considered as alias
# BEE YEN TAN also known as BEE YEN TAN (CHEN MEIYAN);TAN
# `MRS` is considered a title and removed in preprocessing
# CHIM LEE MAI MRS TANG-CHIM LEE MAI;TAN
CHIM LEE MAI TANG-CHIM LEE MAI;TAN
# everything in brackets are considered as alias
